com.hpl.mds.annotations.processor

Class AnnotationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.annotation.processing.AbstractProcessor
      • com.hpl.mds.annotations.processor.AnnotationProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.annotation.processing.Processor

    @SupportedSourceVersion(value=RELEASE_8)
 @SupportedAnnotationTypes(value="com.hpl.mds.annotations.RecordSchema")
public class AnnotationProcessor
extends javax.annotation.processing.AbstractProcessor
    Main entry point for MDS annotation processing, accepting all classes annotated as RecordSchemas
    Author:
    Abraham Alcantara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Stores information related to a RecordSchema

        private java.util.List<AnnotationProcessor.SchemaInfo> schemasInfo
        Stores all the information related to the schemas received from the scanner, the information is used until the last round when the records are generated.

      • managedRecords

        private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> managedRecords
        Stores all class qualified names of the managed records corresponding with the schemas received from the scanner in all rounds.

      • parentsSchemaInfo

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AnnotationProcessor.SchemaInfo> parentsSchemaInfo
        Mapping of schema class qualified name to its corresponding information, only for parent schemas.

      • parentsRecordInfo

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RecordInfo> parentsRecordInfo
        Mapping of schema class qualified name to its corresponding RecordInfo, only for parent schemas. RecordInfo cache to avoid re-parsing of parent schemas.
